verses.verse: וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> came מִקֵּ֣ץ ׀ <WH7093> And it came to pass at the end עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> of twenty שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> years אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which בָּנָ֧ה <WH1129> had built שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <WH8010> wherein Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> and his own house

וְהֶעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> That the cities אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נָתַ֤ן <WH5414> had restored חוּרָם֙ <WH2361> which Huram לִשְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> to Solomon בָּנָ֥ה <WH1129> built שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> Solomon אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וַיּ֥וֹשֶׁב <WH3427> to dwell שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> them and caused the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel
וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> went שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> And Solomon חֲמָ֣ת צוֹבָ֔ה <WH2578> to Hamathzobah וַיֶּחֱזַ֖ק <WH2388> and prevailed עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> and

וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> And he built אֶת־ <WH853> תַּדְמֹ֖ר <WH8412> Tadmor בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> in the wilderness וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> cities הַֽמִּסְכְּנ֔וֹת <WH4543> and all the store אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בָּנָ֖ה <WH1129> which he built בַּחֲמָֽת׃ <WH2574> in Hamath

וַיִּ֜בֶן <WH1129> Also he built אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֤ית חוֹרוֹן֙ <WH1032> Bethhoron הָֽעֶלְי֔וֹן <WH5945> the upper וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית חוֹר֖וֹן <WH1032> and Bethhoron הַתַּחְתּ֑וֹן <WH8481> the nether עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> cities מָצ֔וֹר <WH4692> fenced חוֹמ֖וֹת <WH2346> with walls דְּלָתַ֥יִם <WH1817> gates וּבְרִֽיחַ׃ <WH1280> and bars

וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> בַּעֲלָ֗ת <WH1191> And Baalath וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עָרֵ֤י <WH5892> cities הַֽמִּסְכְּנוֹת֙ <WH4543> and all the store אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after הָי֣וּ <WH1961> had לִשְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> that Solomon וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> cities הָרֶ֔כֶב <WH7393> had and all the chariot וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> and the cities הַפָּרָשִׁ֑ים <WH6571> of the horsemen וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all חֵ֣שֶׁק <WH2837> desire שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> and all that Solomon אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after חָשַׁק֙ <WH2836> have a delight לִבְנ֤וֹת <WH1129> to build בִּירֽוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> in Jerusalem וּבַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <WH3844> and in Lebanon וּבְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> and throughout all the land מֶמְשַׁלְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH4474> dominion

כָּל־ <WH3605> All הָ֠עָם <WH5971> [As for] all the people הַנּוֹתָ֨ר <WH3498> [that were] left מִן־ <WH4480> at הַחִתִּ֜י <WH2850> of the Hittites וְהָאֱמֹרִ֤י <WH567> and the Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּי֙ <WH6522> and the Perizzites וְהַחִוִּ֣י <WH2340> and the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֔י <WH2983> and the Jebusites אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> who לֹ֥א <WH3808> were not מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> which [were] not of Israel הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like

מִן־ <WH4480> at בְּנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH1121> [But] of their children אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who נוֹתְר֤וּ <WH3498> who were left אַחֲרֵיהֶם֙ <WH310> after בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> them in the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom לֹֽא־ <WH3808> had not כִלּ֖וּם <WH3615> consumed בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> whom the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיַּעֲלֵ֤ם <WH5927> make to pay שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> not them did Solomon לְמַ֔ס <WH4522> tribute עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> until this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וּמִן־ <WH4480> from בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> But of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> did not נָתַ֧ן <WH5414> make שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <WH8010> did Solomon לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> no servants לִמְלַאכְתּ֑וֹ <WH4399> for his work כִּי־ <WH3588> for הֵ֜מָּה <WH1992> but אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH582> but they [were] men מִלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> of war וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and chief שָׁלִישָׁ֔יו <WH7991> of his captains וְשָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> and captains רִכְבּ֖וֹ <WH7393> of his chariots וּפָרָשָֽׁיו׃ <WH6571> and horsemen פ

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <WH428> These שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> And these [were] the chief [הַנְּצִיבִים כ] (הַנִּצָּבִ֛ים <WH5333> garrison ק) אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of king שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> Solomon's חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> and fifty וּמָאתָ֑יִם <WH3967> [even] two hundred הָרֹדִ֖ים <WH7287> that bare rule בָּעָֽם׃ <WH5971> over the people

וְאֶת־ <WH853> בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter פַּרְעֹ֗ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh הֶעֱלָ֤ה <WH5927> brought up שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> And Solomon מֵעִ֣יר <WH5892> out of the city דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> of David לַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> unto the house אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בָּֽנָה־ <WH1129> that he had built לָ֑הּ כִּ֣י <WH3588> because אָמַ֗ר <WH559> for her for he said לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תֵשֵׁ֨ב <WH3427> shall not dwell אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> My wife לִי֙ בְּבֵית֙ <WH1004> in the house דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> of David מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּי־ <WH3588> because קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> because [the places are] holy הֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> the places אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> where בָּֽאָ֥ה <WH935> hath come אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> about אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> whereunto the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD פ

אָ֣ז <WH227> Then הֶעֱלָ֧ה <WH5927> offered שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <WH8010> Then Solomon עֹל֖וֹת <WH5930> burnt offerings לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD עַ֚ל <WH5921> on מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> on the altar יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בָּנָ֖ה <WH1129> which he had built לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הָאוּלָֽם׃ <WH197> the porch

וּבִדְבַר־ <WH1697> Even after a certain rate י֣וֹם <WH3117> every day בְּי֗וֹם <WH3117> to the daily לְהַעֲלוֹת֙ <WH5927> offering כְּמִצְוַ֣ת <WH4687> according to the commandment מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> of Moses לַשַּׁבָּתוֹת֙ <WH7676> on the sabbaths וְלֶ֣חֳדָשִׁ֔ים <WH2320> and on the new moons וְלַמּ֣וֹעֲד֔וֹת <WH4150> and on the solemn feasts שָׁל֥וֹשׁ <WH7969> three פְּעָמִ֖ים <WH6471> times בַּשָּׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> in the year בְּחַ֧ג <WH2282> [even] in the feast הַמַּצּ֛וֹת <WH4682> of unleavened bread וּבְחַ֥ג <WH2282> and in the feast הַשָּׁבֻע֖וֹת <WH7620> of weeks וּבְחַ֥ג <WH2282> and in the feast הַסֻּכּֽוֹת׃ <WH5521> of tabernacles

וַיַּעֲמֵ֣ד <WH5975> And he appointed כְּמִשְׁפַּ֣ט <WH4941> according to the order דָּֽוִיד־ <WH1732> of David אָ֠בִיו <WH1> his father אֶת־ <WH853> מַחְלְק֨וֹת <WH4256> the courses הַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים <WH3548> of the priests עַל־ <WH5921> for עֲבֹדָתָ֗ם <WH5656> to their service וְהַלְוִיִּ֣ם <WH3881> and the Levites עַל־ <WH5921> for מִ֠שְׁמְרוֹתָם <WH4931> to their charges לְהַלֵּ֨ל <WH1984> to praise וּלְשָׁרֵ֜ת <WH8334> and minister נֶ֤גֶד <WH5048> before הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> before the priests לִדְבַר־ <WH1697> as the duty י֣וֹם <WH3117> of every day בְּיוֹמ֔וֹ <WH3117> required וְהַשּׁוֹעֲרִ֥ים <WH7778> the porters בְּמַחְלְקוֹתָ֖ם <WH4256> also by their courses לְשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> at every gate וָשָׁ֑עַר <WH8179> gate כִּ֣י <WH3588> for כֵ֔ן <WH3651> had so מִצְוַ֖ת <WH4687> commanded דָּוִ֥יד <WH1732> for so had David אִישׁ־ <WH376> the man הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not סָרוּ֩ <WH5493> And they departed מִצְוַ֨ת <WH4687> not from the commandment הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king עַל־ <WH5921> unto הַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <WH3548> unto the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֛ם <WH3881> and Levites לְכָל־ <WH3605> any דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> concerning any matter וְלָאֹצָרֽוֹת׃ <WH214> or concerning the treasures

וַתִּכֹּן֙ <WH3559> was prepared כָּל־ <WH3605> all מְלֶ֣אכֶת <WH4399> Now all the work שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> of Solomon עַד־ <WH5704> and until הַיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> unto the day מוּסַ֥ד <WH4143> of the foundation בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְעַד־ <WH5704> and until כְּלֹת֑וֹ <WH3615> and until it was finished שָׁלֵ֖ם <WH8003> was perfected בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> [So] the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD ס

אָז֩ <WH227> Then הָלַ֨ךְ <WH1980> Then went שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <WH8010> Solomon לְעֶצְיֽוֹן־ גֶּ֧בֶר <WH6100> to Eziongeber וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to אֵיל֛וֹת <WH359> and to Eloth עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׂפַ֥ת <WH8193> side הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> at the sea בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> of Edom

וַיִּֽשְׁלַֽח־ <WH7971> sent לוֹ֩ חוּרָ֨ם <WH2361> And Huram בְּיַד־ <WH3027> him by the hands עֲבָדָ֜יו <WH5650> of his servants [אֹונִיֹּות כ] (אֳנִיֹּ֗ות <WH591> ship ק) וַעֲבָדִים֮ <WH5650> and servants י֣וֹדְעֵי <WH3045> that had knowledge יָם֒ <WH3220> of the sea וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> and they went עִם־ <WH5973> with עַבְדֵ֤י <WH5650> with the servants שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> of Solomon אוֹפִ֔ירָה <WH211> to Ophir וַיִּקְח֣וּ <WH3947> and took מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> there אַרְבַּע־ <WH702> thence four מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> and fifty כִּכַּ֣ר <WH3603> talents זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> of gold וַיָּבִ֖יאוּ <WH935> and brought אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> [them] to king שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> Solomon פ
